Claim: "A man stands speaking to a crowd of sitting people."
Implication: "A boy is riding a wave on his surfboard."
Referring expressions: A man, crowd of sitting people.  A boy, surfboard, wave
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsStanding(a) and ~IsSitting(b)))) -> (exists e (exists c (exists d (IsRiding(c,d) and IsOnWave(e)))))
